Articles.Content:
So, I can't make any more posts on the KSP Steam forums for 24 hours because apparently I made "too many posts recently." (I heard the limit is 200 posts?)

In my own defense, I've been helping people with technical support issues and game play questions arising from the 1.4 update all day today. (It's snowing on and off and I'm sitting about because I drive a plow truck and there isn't much else to do in the short times between trips.)

So...is Steam ridiculous for stopping me from helping people? Or should I take this as a sign that I should prolly take a break? Lol. Didn't know where else to put this, feel free to move it mods. D:

Edited March 7, 2018 by Rocket In My Pocket

I always knew you were bit of a windbag. 

 

J/K of course.

11 minutes ago, Geonovast said:

I always knew you were bit of a windbag. 

 

J/K of course.

I know right lol.

The more I thought about it, I realized 200 posts in one day is absurd, that's 1/10 of my total posts here on the KSP forums, in the last...3-4 years? In the space of less than a full day.

To be completely honest; it wasn't all philanthropic...A "small" portion may have been me arguing with people about the new EULA...
